1.0.name: wordpress/colorsnap
1.0.description: Instantly change the entire color scheme to any color you can imagine with just one simple setting! Also, easily set your own custom logo/header and background. Also responsive! Simply set your favorite color under Appearance > Theme Color in your WP admin and save. Thank you. - Official Support Forum: bryanhadaway.com/forum/projects
